PagerSource

restrict: 'A'

NameTypeDesciption
pagerSourceno parameter
itemssourceobjectitem source which will use for pagination
resultsobjectafter pagination results returns current paged items
filterobjectfilter to filter itemssource
ng-modelcurrent page number
items-per-pagenumberhow many items on each page
sortnumbersorted column name
descendingboolsort descending
class string pagination-lg pagination pagination-sm pagination-xs
In Theaters {{currentPage}}

    {{item.title}}

    {{item.synopsis}}
    <ul pager-source itemssource='moviesInTheaters' results="pagedmoviesInTheaters" filter="moviesInTheatersfilter" class="pagination-xs pagination" ng-model="currentPage" items-per-page="5"></ul>
    <div class="panel widget-comments">
      <div class="panel-heading">
        <span class="panel-title"><i class="panel-title-icon fa fa-comment-o"></i>In Theaters</span>
        <div class="panel-heading-controls pull-right">
          <ul pager-source itemssource='moviesInTheaters' results="pagedmoviesInTheaters" filter="moviesInTheatersfilter" class="pagination-xs pagination" ng-model="currentPage" items-per-page="5"></ul> 
          <form action="" style="width:200px">
            <div class="input-group input-group-sm">
              <input type="text" class="form-control" ng-model="moviesInTheatersfilter.title" placeholder="Search..." name="s">
              <span class="input-group-btn"><button class="btn" type="submit"><span class="fa fa-search"></span></button></span>
                    </div>
                </form>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="panel-body">
          <div class="comment" style="clear:both" ng-repeat="item in pagedmoviesInTheaters">
            <div style="float:left"><img alt="" ng-src="{{item.posters.detailed}}"></div>
            <div style="margin-left:80px" class="comment-body">
              <div class="comment-by"><h4><a title="" href="#">{{item.title}}</a></h4></div>
              <div class="comment-text" mm-scroll="75">{{item.synopsis}}</div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
    </div>
